In England, in the seven days to 29 June, there were 117,062 new confirmed cases (207.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 22 June, there were 67,357 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 74% (49,705 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 04 July is 4,259,710 (7,532.6 cases per 100,000 population).
